is this activator activate forever for microsoft office 2013? or just 6 months like KMSnano?
how to use this toolkit? when do I need to run this? after or before I install mic office? (i'm new in installing softwares like this)

@Red.
Autorearm leaves you in grace period forever and AutoKMS leaves you KMS activated forever. If you manage to get a working key, Phone activation will give you a perfectly clean activation forever. This works on Office 2013, but make sure you use a Volume edition.

@marielisa
1. Download and install Office (make sure it is a volume edition like https://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/7963896)
2. Run Microsoft Toolkit
3. Select the Office icon to enter the Office Toolkit
4. Go to Activation tab
5. Click EZ-Activator
6. Verify that Office is activated under File - Account
@WDoubleYouW so this will active forever just for volume edition?

@Red.
I'm not certain. I've just heard that people have had trouble with retail, and since there really isn't a benefit of having retail over volume, just stick with the volume edition. Autorearm should work for retail perfectly I think, but most people prefer to see the beautiful "product activated" thing on their Account page. Read the thread from the toolkit's authors for the best information.

New Version: 2.4.3
Changelog:

2.4.3
-All KMS PID Settings default to RandomKMSPID due to KMS PID blacklisting.
-Disable all KMS Server Service settings if it is not installed.
-Fixed AutoKMS Scheduled Task paths breaking if you installed or removed Custom Task after rerunning the program.
-Using new program icon.

2.4.2
-Added warning prompts for Rearm and Microsoft Office Uninstaller.
-Allow KMS PID to have a 5 digit LCID.
-AutoKMS Scheduled Task works when the local calendar is not Gregorian.
-KMS Client used to charge a KMS Server with insufficient client count now works on KMS Servers running Windows Vista.
-More options for KMS Server Service.
-Settings moved to %ALLUSERSPROFILE%Microsoft Toolkit. Please delete or move your old settings.
-Show KMS Server PID in License Check for KMS Activated licenses.
-Support for newer Microsoft Office 2013 installers in Channel Switcher.
